org.apache.flex.compiler.ant

Class MXMLCTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tools.ant.ProjectComponent
      • org.apache.tools.ant.Task
        • org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Java
          • org.apache.flex.compiler.ant.FlexTask
            • org.apache.flex.compiler.ant.MXMLCTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, org.apache.tools.ant.DynamicAttribute, org.apache.tools.ant.DynamicConfigurator, org.apache.tools.ant.DynamicElement

    public final class MXMLCTask
extends FlexTask
implements org.apache.tools.ant.DynamicConfigurator
    Implements the <mxmlc> Ant task.

    For example: 

     <mxmlc file="${bug}.mxml"
         debug="false"
         keep="true"
         verbose-stacktraces="false"
         incremental="false"
         strict="true"
         benchmark="true"
         report-invalid-styles-as-warnings="true"
         show-invalid-css-property-warnings="false"
         tools-locale="de_DE"
         fork="false">
     <source-path path-element="${FLEX_HOME}/frameworks/projects/framework/src"/>
 </mxmlc>
    All the simple mxmlc configuration parameters are supported as tag attributes. Complex configuration options, like -compiler.namespaces.namespace, are implemented as child tags. For example:

    <namespace uri="http://www.adobe.com/2006/mxml" manifest="${basedir}/manifest.xml"/>

      • prepareCommandline

        protected void prepareCommandline()
                           throws org.apache.tools.ant.BuildException
        Description copied from class: FlexTask
        Called by execute after the set ConfigVariables in vars has been added to the commandline. This function is responsible for adding all tool-specific options to the commandline as well as setting the default options of a build tool.
